author: malvern-online.com
title: Deep Productions Studios Announces Psychological Horror Feature Film âTobiasâ
text:
Deep Productions Studios LLC is set to deliver a chilling cinematic experience with its upcoming psychological horror film, Tobias. Written and directed by Lawrence Lee Wallace, Tobias explores the fragile boundaries between reality and delusion, offering a harrowing look into the unraveling mind of its protagonist.
Starring Edward Williams III and Ivan Ellis, the film follows Tobias, a man tormented by his own psyche, as he embarks on a disturbing journey fueled by paranoia and violence. As his mental turmoil deepens, the lines between sanity and darkness blur, forcing both the character and the audience to confront the terrifying depths of the human mind.
A Talented Cast and Crew Bring "Tobias" to Life
Leading the film is Edward Williams III, known for his roles in PowerBook: Force, South Side, and I Got Problemz. Opposite him is Ivan Ellis, recognized for The Vince Staples Show, The Chi, and Soundtrack. The cast also features Camille Wiggins and Kelley Holcomb, further enhancing the film’s compelling performances.
Director Lawrence Lee Wallace, acclaimed for his work on The Girls & Rodney (Amazon), Night Thrasher: Rave (Marvel Comics), and Pieces of David (Amazon), brings his expertise in psychological storytelling to this latest project. The film’s striking visuals are crafted by Director of Photography Vick Lee, a seasoned cinematographer known for Kold & Windy (WETV).
A Production That Pushes Boundaries
Produced by Deep Productions Studios LLC, Tobias is part of the studio’s commitment to bold, thought-provoking filmmaking. With a focus on psychological horror, the film aims to immerse audiences in a suspenseful and unsettling narrative.
Set for release later this year, Tobias will be available on multiple streaming platforms, allowing audiences to experience its chilling tale from anywhere. The film is also a part of The Dark Hallways Anthology Universe, an interconnected series of horror stories exploring the darkest aspects of human nature.
For exclusive content and updates, visit: Amazon Fawesome TV Patreon
About Deep Productions Studios LLC
Deep Productions Studios LLC is a film production company dedicated to creating innovative and genre-defying content. With a passion for storytelling that challenges conventions, the studio continues to produce films that leave a lasting impact on audiences.
